author: Pule Sompane
information: Since 2021 Tiisetso has been responsible for the development of our website which has been instrumental to the growth of our company.  He also implemented effective project management and Q&A processes. As a result Tiisetso has been an highly valued and impactful member of our team.

author: Sibusiso Nkabinde
information: Tiisetso is one of the best professionals that we have known in web development skills. Between his skills you can find good communication and accuracy with the planning in complex projects.
